IMUSim
Package imusim :: Package behaviours :: Module imu :: Class BasicIMUBehaviour

Class BasicIMUBehaviour

source code

Basic behaviour for an IMU that performs periodic sampling.

Metaclass for defining Abstract Base Classes (ABCs).

Method Details

__init__(self, imu, samplingPeriod, calibration=None, filter=None, sampleCallback=None, initialTime=0)
(Constructor)

source code 

Initialise IMU behaviour.

Parameters:
  • imu - IMU on which the behaviour executes.
  • samplingPeriod - Interval at which to sample and process (float).
  • calibration - Mapping from IMU Sensors to SensorCalibrations (dict).
  • filter - OrientationFilter to update with each set of samples.
  • sampleCallback - Function to call after each sample. The behaviour object will be passed as a single argument.
  • initialTime - Initial time for local timekeeping.
Overrides: object.__init__

Instance Variable Details

sampleCallback

Function to call after each sample. The behaviour object will be passed as a single argument.
